hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"I heard the Prophet say; 'do not wear shirts, or pants, or 'Imamahs, or burnouses, or Khuffs while in Ihram.'''(sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ لُبْسِ الْخُفَّيْنِ، فِي الإِحْرَامِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition of wearing Khuffs in Ihram
